_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CDN
author: avesmaximus@gmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt -y install curl unzip git

ARCH=$([[ "$(uname -m)" == "x86_64" ]] && echo "linux-x64" || echo "linux-x64")

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

rm bin -r
mkdir bin
git clone -b ${BRANCH} ${GAME_REPO} repo
ls
echo "---cloned---"

echo "---going into repo---"
cd repo
echo "---building repo---"
dotnet publish -c Release -r linux-x64 --no-self-contained
ls

echo "---moving build---"
mv Robust.Cdn/bin/Release/net8.0/linux-x64/publish/* ../bin

echo "---removing repo---"
cd ..
rm repo/ -r

echo "---configuring---"
# if [ ! -f datadir/server_config.toml ]; then
#     curl http://168.119.12.160:4003/raw/vihiyiwele.makefile --output datadir/server_config.toml
#     echo "---no config file found, downloading template---"
# fi
touch appsettings.json
chmod 755 bin/Robust.Cdn
ls


echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: Github branch
variables.description: this is the branch the build will pull from
